r.s: Decode and Encode data in Bittorrent format
r.d: This package consists of three classes which handles the encoding and decoding of data in Bittorrent format. You can also extract useful informations from .torrent files, create .torrent files and query the torrent's scrape page to get its statistics.
r.n: * First stable release * Changed license from PHP to LGPL. * Changed package.xml to version 2. * A warm welcome to Justin (handle: nagash) as new developer. * Enhances File_Bittorrent_Decode::decodeFile() filename handling. * Check for allow_url_fopen. * Raise an error in File_Bittorrent_MakeTorrent if no file is given. * Save last PEAR_Error object in public property.
